text:
"The VeggieTales Show" (also known simply as "VeggieTales") is an American Christian live action and computer animated children's television series based on the series VeggieTales. The series is produced by TBN, NBCUniversal, Big Idea Productions and Trilogy Animation, and the series started on October 22, 2019.
Characters.
Most of the characters are the same from the other VeggieTales shows. The show brings back many characters that have not been seen in a long time, such as Mr. Nezzer (owner of the show's theater), Petunia Rhubarb (as president of the "VeggieTales" fan club), Khalil (half worm, half caterpillar from '), Bruce Onion (from "Celery Night Fever"), and Goliath (from "Dave and the Giant Pickle").
